title: Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing Information Literacy Competencies in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational digital skills or experience in academic resource searching
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning feasible in smartphone-centric constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply a 5-step framework to evaluate the credibility of academic resources in scientific fields.
Learners can efficiently navigate three or more academic databases on mobile devices.
Learners acquire basic digital production skills to convert research findings into visual materials (e.g., infographics).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
